name: Turtle Beach RECON 70 Headset for Nintendo Switch | Dell USA
description: Built for your next Victory Royale, your latest achievement and much more with the Turtle Beach RECON 70 gaming headset for PS4 Pro and PS. Featuring Turtle Beach's lightweight and comfortable headset design for hours of play, with high-quality 40mm speakers and over-ear premium synthetic leather cushions that let you hear every crisp high and thundering low while blocking noise. Turtle Beach's renowned high-sensitivity mic to ensure you are heard clearly and easily flips up to mute. Finally, the versatile 3.5mm connection makes it perfect for swapping between PS4 and Xbox One controllers, Nintendo Switch as well as PC and compatible mobile devices.
